website_summaries.verdict: If Linux is your system, this is a reliable desktop replacement.
pros: Great feature set and will work great as a Linux PC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed/Defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact same one and received it today. Went to register and half the keys did not type. How can it be called CERTIFIED and the keys do not type. You would think this was part of the process to get it certified.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Carter

customer_reviews.title: Product was not as described/pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an E6430, received an E6430S. The pictures and description clearly stated and showed an E6430. the S model has less USB ports, less connectivity/upgrade options, and a mini vs regular HDMI port all in a different chassis than the E6430. Also, pictures showed a CDRW drive, both models originally come with a CDRW drive but mine simply has a cheap aftermarket piece of plastic covering where the drive should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not refurbished, detective item.
customer_reviews.text: I believe these reviews are nit genuine. This computer did not work. Had to turn it on computer at least 5 times just to get it to start. Could not turn it on after that. Does not have windows installed at all. Computer is defective and not refurbished, I am returning the product and would advise everyone to not purchase any products from this seller. You will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSoul

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: we love it. came really fast and works great. No issues and works as good as any we have. I use these as register computers for my stores. So this gets used a lot everyday. Couldn't ask for better. Will order more as backups now. My order came very fast and was packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wade

customer_reviews.title: I figured that it being a Dell Inspiron I couldn't go wrong and I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived and it was in great shape. No marks
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant in buying a refurbished laptop. I figured that it being a Dell Inspiron I couldn't go wrong and I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived and it was in great shape. No marks,dents or scratches. A battery, and charger were included. Am I pleased with my purchase let's say that I will buy another one for wife. Amazon has yet to disappoint me. Refurbished products highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Vega

customer_reviews.title: Very Good So Far & High Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived very well packed and the exterior of the machine was so clean I would have thought it a new one. A couple of years ago I happily defected to a LInux OS, especially after Microsoft's soft arm-twisting to get on the Windows 10 bandwagon. Although there is Windows 10 on this machine, I installed Linux Cinnamon MInt 19 without a hitch and it is running fine. For the quality of "renewing" a used device, RefurbConnect gets a thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Notzon

customer_reviews.title: Was in perfect condition. I bought it for my wife who ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a day early! Was in perfect condition. I bought it for my wife who seems to be very pleased. I'm not the greatest in setting everything up on computers, but as luck would have it the Mormon missionaries came along and set it up. They loaded Windows 10 and showed me how to set up a shortcut for E-mails. This is the 3rd refurbished Dell computer I have bought in the past few months. The other two were Optiplex 780's desktops. They also work well. I use one, and my daughter in Florida's five kids like and use the other one. I know that used is not for everybody, but this deal works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Glen W.  McBride

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing Refurbishing
customer_reviews.text: The laptop works mostly ok so far. But it was filthy. The refurbisher did not clean sticky mess all over the trackpad and the DVD unit cover. Also, the screen was wobbly. A matter of tightening four screws. I finf it very unprofessional to deliver a refurbished item in such condition. Functionally, the fingerprint reader was not only dirty but it appears to be damaged or inoperable at this time. Amazon should do a better job at vetting refurbishers even if they claim they are Microsoft approved ones.
customer_reviews.author: josefo

customer_reviews.title: Laptop Has No Camera Not Good For Virtual Meetings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop to use for zoom meetings so I wouldn't have to keep borrowing my daughter's. Guess what. No web cam. My fault for not looking closer at the description, but honestly who builds a laptop with no internal camera?!! What??!! The point of a modern laptop is it's all there including the web cam, no fuss just log in to zoom, but alas not with this puppy. I can use it as a back up for work, but will have to buy another laptop with a camera to get the job done. I'm very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Atgood

customer_reviews.title: No DVD drive.
customer_reviews.text: The notebook I received had no DVD drive, the touch up paint was poorly done, there were bits of what looked like notebook paper in the exhaust port blocking it and the screen bezel is coming loose. After doing an overall clean and removing the paper bits, it booted up and installed Windows 10 Pro. It seems to operate fine so far but I am disappointed on not having a DVD drive.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time buying a refurbished product on Amazon. So far so good, I will leave here my 1st impression and eventually update this review if I need to. Package: Excellent! (laptop was very well protected inside the box) Product: Good! (minor scratches and natural cosmetic wear and tear) Performance: Very Good! (Product specs exactly how advertised, just had to activate windows 10 with the serial number underneath the laptop)
customer_reviews.author: Bluefrog

customer_reviews.title: Product description doesn't match product received
customer_reviews.text: Don't purchase. This did not come with the camera stated in the description. The battery only lasts and hour or so. I bought this for online school and having a camera was essential. When I do a lot of work it tends to lock up and I have to shut the whole computer down and restart. It is a very old model and is extremely large and heavy. When open the screen wobbles. I truly wish I had just spent the extra money and bought a new one. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: the computer was good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer from MicroBee as the third party seller. I can't give it 5 starts because when I received it, the battery would not hold a charge. The only way the computer would work is to have it plugged into a wall socket which didn't work for my son at college. I contacted the seller who sent a new battery and wall charger, and now it works. Other than that problem which was quickly resolved, the computer was good.
customer_reviews.author: GA Peach

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is amazing..
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is amazing... I was always skeptical about buying refurbished products but after I got this one from JoySystems I completely changed my mind. The laptop had very minor scratches but other than that it was brand new. It ran very fast and came with clear instructions to activate the genuine windows. The only thing I didn't like about it was that it was a bit heavy but I guess that's the model and I could have never known this without carrying it. Other than that I just love it... will defiantly try other refurbished laptops in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mostafa

customer_reviews.title: Laptop works but battery protruding more than an inch off the base
customer_reviews.text: Product works but was disappointed with the battery pack protruding 1.5 inches beyond the base of the laptop. looks like the original battery was replaced but the new battery is not a compatible size for this laptop model. The anomaly wasn't mentioned in the product description or shown in the product images. Should have at least made it known to the buyer. Very disappointed with getting tricked but the product still works and rest of the specs matches. see pictures for what was actually received.
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this computer
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the computer started locking up and running very slow. Spent an hour with Amazon and tech support and they couldn't fix the problem. They forwarded me to Dell tech support and I gave them the product support key and was told the computer was out of warranty. Now I am getting messages that I need to activate windows. Buyer beware 5-15 update. I have been contacted by the seller and they are trying to resolve the issue. I will amend the review once I hear back from them. I want to give them a chance to do the right thing and they have been open so far. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Pickett

customer_reviews.title: I got mine with 4GB RAM
customer_reviews.text: It says 8 GB on description, and I needed 8, but the one I received has 4 GB RAM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong computer received
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if a simple mistake or a bate and switch. I received an e5430 Non-vPro and only 4gb RAM. No camera, and slightly slower CPU. Batter may not have been charged did not last long enough to boot up. I did not activate Windows 10. Packed it back up and returned it within minutes or receiving it. Should have received a Dell Latitude e6430 with 8gb RAM.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for college students
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is extended if you use a base fan under it. Speakers work but crackle terribly (just use earbuds) Overall, works great espically for the price
customer_reviews.author: Saaja

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Needed a laptop I could install my Go-Global software to give me fast, reliable access over the internet so I can access my office applications back in my office while I am remote. This laptop was well worth the moNet . Not to heavy. Fast startup, and performance is awesome. Only 1 draw is the bottom does get hot where the battery is, but I simply elevate it so air can flow under the machine
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Mish

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but power supply smaller than it should be
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laptop, works great, Windows 10. Have used it to edit some video and it seems up to the task. My only issue is that when I first turned it on I got a message that said the power supply should be a 90 watt supply and the supplied power supply was only 65 watts. Seems to work ok, if it weren't this I would give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY FROM THEM!!!!! JUNK in less than 60hrs no support no fix...
customer_reviews.text: What an ABSOLUTE, waste of time and money. I voughtthis laptop Dec 2 2019. And the hard drive, along with all my diagnostic software for my BMWs and coding software, is gone. I bought this just for working with bmw cars and not even 60 hours on it total! W The actual F? And no support available.... Huh.... Waste
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN

customer_reviews.title: Service was excellent. Sending a corrupt product was unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this laptop is being returned. It never worked well and we could not figure out why. We took it to Micro Center to look at it and they said the hard drive was corrupt. As far as placing the order and receiving the product on time, that was excellent. Sending us a corrupt product was unacceptable. Recommendation from Micro Center was to trash it, it was too old and not worth trying to recover.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but Goodie
customer_reviews.text: I like the laptop, came on time and everything worked out the box. I knew it was an old laptop, but it looks new, clean, and works just as well. Came with Win 10 Pro. Considering what I wanted to use it for, the 326 GB (I think... I can't remember the storage size as I am writing this) was not enough for me so I bought a 2 TB internal Hard Drive to replace it. Oh yeah, one last thing that surprised me as well although no biggie, the laptop doesn't have/come with a webcam. No biggie for me as I like to use external webcams anyway. Overall I give it 4.5 out 5...
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great value super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is and smooth fast. Came with a webcam even though it is not stated. Has back lit camera and is very fast. Best business decision by I have made. Great seller. And the laptop specs are an absolute steal for the money. Thanks for the super fast shipping. Mine can in like 3 to 4 days. I truly was not expecting that from a non prime order.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Norton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled- stay away!
customer_reviews.text: What a joke! This computer has white spots on the screen, it is dented, beat up, scratched up, poor battery life and there was something sticky all over the keypad and screen. Do yourself a favor and spend you $200 plus dollars somewhere else. My 12 year old spent all his saved money on this POS. HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Q

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with laptop condition and functionality. Deleted some unnecessary programs and installed my own security preferences.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Received within a few days of the order and everything looked fine. There was already a decent charge on the battery so I was able to get up and running in short order. The downloads of the updates for Windows 10 took about 10 minutes but after that it was simply a matter of learning the tricks of using it. I previously had a Windows 7 based system. It's been in use almost a week now with no problems and everything runs fast and is as advertised. I haven't completely drained the battery after a full charge, but it looks like it could go for 3.5 to 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Al D from FL

customer_reviews.title: Could never tell its “refurbished” 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my husbands work and he absolutely loves it! Its making his work lifemuch easier!! ***please mark as “useful” if this review helped you.
customer_reviews.author: J.O

customer_reviews.title: Great little refurb laptop for a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this laptop to teach online classes, MS Office functions, check email, listen to music and surf the web. I’ve had it for about a year now. This affordable little refurb laptop gets the job done perfectly. It was a little scratched up when I got it, but for $150, who cares as long as it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Garbage out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Bad VGA screen out of the box. Had to return same day. this NEVER should have made it past a Microsoft certified refurbisher.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Moulesong

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop I like that it has DVD drive but the screen is a little small because the webcam and frame also don't like that it is a little slow downloading the programs but for a used laptop it is great you can't ask for more lack touch screen but if you need touch screen you have to pay more for a laptop or buy a tablet
customer_reviews.author: Roland O.

customer_reviews.title: Good little computer
customer_reviews.text: So far I am happy. I purchased one for my elderly mother and one for myself. I was quite shocked to find I do not have a bluetooth connection. But for this price and the addition of a $15 adapter, it's still a good buy. It is heavier than I expected, so be prepared for that. But a good deal overall.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Becker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this as a gift for my mother. After I received it I had to download the updates for Win 10. After doing so and charging the batteries I added a few book marks to make it easy for her to use. Everything is as advertised and I am very pleased. This computer is a lot faster than the one she had and should serve her well. By the way I had seen some discrepancies as to whether there was a camera or not, mine did not have one. But she doesn't need or even care to have one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy new, it's worth a few more bucks
customer_reviews.text: Ive had computer for one day and it's terrible. The initial set up went well but it freezes Everytime I try to open windows. It's super slow and glitchy. I would just spend whatever it takes to get a new computer. This is a waste of money people. My 8 year old laptop runs circles around this renewed laptop from skytech.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Gave the battery life a 3 star only cause it died in one month had to buy a new battery but the warranty paid me back no other problems with it laptop works great price was good have lots of storage space
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi  Ali

customer_reviews.title: Computer was ok,  battery was shot
customer_reviews.text: The computer worked fine. An old machine but what do I expect for the price. However the battery was completely shot. The computer only works when plugged in. Fortunately my application didn't require me to ever have it unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy folkins

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished laptop looks and works like new
customer_reviews.text: This is my second refurbished Dell Latitude laptop. After a few years it was time to upgrade to windows 10 pro. This refurbished laptop is even better than the last one. It looks and works like new. Great sound quality without external speakers. Has long battery life which is hard to find in a refurb. Had issue with wrong adapter, but seller quickly replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the laptop. I love Dell and this was simply too good of a deal to pass by. The machine setup was easy and the it works perfectly for taking online courses and blogging.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Awful experience
customer_reviews.text: Someone didn't do their job. Didn't work from the start. Bad hard drive, bad battery...bad experience. I didn't expect perfection from a refurbished, but this was a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Konitshek

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a certified refurbished but it came with a part missing, alot of stratch, the battery dies quickly, not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews but I would like to warn anyone who is looking at this computer—look elsewhere. It was refurbished. Supposedly a federal government computer and could never get any tech help. I hardly used it and it just went blank and died this week. When it worked ot was ok but i’ll never buy refirbished again.
customer_reviews.author: tricia heath

customer_reviews.title: Great value maybe but worth what you pay for sure.
customer_reviews.text: My son seems to have no issues with this as his 1st laptop it works it's not the best quality is not the worst quality is exactly what you expect for the money.
customer_reviews.author: dustin owen

customer_reviews.title: Good refurbished computer
customer_reviews.text: Shipped faster than expected. Computer had a little more cosmetic flaws than I am used to from refurbished buys in the past but not terrible. After windows update computer is working fine. CD player would not open first day but they sent a new one quickly and without 20 questions. All in all pretty good deal
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Decent laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Description says 8gig of ram. Mine arrived with only 4 gig. Contacted seller and they shipped a memory card which arrived in 2 days. Installed it and seems to work. Hardware seems to work pretty good. Battery only seems to last about 2 hours of constant use, which is a little annoying, but otherwise seems to be working well. It comes with an unactivated version of windows, and an activation code, which is annoying, but shipping activated windows can be a security risk, so theres that.
customer_reviews.author: Customer2319

customer_reviews.title: Not sure!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure whether I’m happy or not! I thought there was a word program on it! I keep getting messages that I need to buy a word program. Should that be right? Please contact me!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Vial

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished computer is clean works as it should and arrived as promised. I must say that this laptop seems like a tank; very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Good value, if you're willing to oversee a few problems.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6. Two were missing the cover for the stick pointer. All came with some crappy chinese chargers that overheated and worked intermittently. Other than that, they work fine for what I need them for. If you do buy one get an OEM charger.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar H. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife just for surfing the web, after removing it from the packaging we were very pleased to see the condition of it witch was excellent. After setting it up for her witch I must add went very smoothly and only took minutes I was very pleased, I said to my wife I should have bought one for myself instead of spending a $1000.00 on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I received this laptop in the most worst condition ever. There was stuff all over the keyboard, and the computer itself was dented EVERYWHERE. Certified refurbished my A$#. The battery lasts 2 hours on a full charge. Buyer BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean and works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It came well packaged and as advertised. It looks and acts like a new laptop for a fraction of the cost. If you have questions their customer service is fast and prompt. I am 100% satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: scssw

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money on this
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money on this. It has an operating system that Microsoft does not support. Never again will I purchase a laptop/computer from Amazon. I learned an EXPENSIVE lesson!
customer_reviews.author: B SWIFT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: I recently took over IT support needs for a local church, and needed a basic laptop at an almost impossible to find price. What I found here was beyond my expectations, in that I got a laptop that fully met every need and then more, and it was also at an incredible price. It's a renewed laptop, but it showed up looking as close to brand new as possible. Absolutely 100% pleased with this seller and will be return for more.
customer_reviews.author: R. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.text: Great find. Fast start up. No blue screen of death. The only issue I had was the pc did not come with a power cord! Very uncool.
customer_reviews.author: michele Shearin

customer_reviews.title: It looked like new. Setup was very simple and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of expected time. It looked like new. Setup was very simple and smooth. No issues. Everything needed (production keys, contract information) was there. System was clean and fresh, unlike those we bought from stores which pre-loaded with lots of unwanted stuff (such as free trying applications which we may not even know what they were for). So far so good. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Dont but
customer_reviews.text: Received 1st one died after 1 day. Got error message battery cant charge. Amazon sends me another the new one i open really scuffed up. Key board dirty & missing pieces. Returned. Cant reach the company by phone no answer for 3 days. Wouldnt buy again.
customer_reviews.author: antwayne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by price
customer_reviews.text: Seriously spend like 50-100 more for something new. I don’t know what this refurbish process is like but since day 1 this piece of junk has run slower and had more issues than my trusty thinkpad it finally replaced. Boot time: approximately 10-12 minutes to functional. This PC literally only runs MS Office and chrome. THE most basic workload. Inconsistent connection ports: behaves poorly with any HDMI connection or even reading USB devices on Windows 10. Total trash do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT NOT AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking I was gonna get what the item is described as...WRONG. The product said it was Windows 10 but it was Windows 7 with NO product key. It said it had 8GB of RAM, only had 4GB. Last, I'm pretty sure the battery was completely dead on arrival, as I had to put the charger in and 10 minutes in the battery still said 0% available but charging..highly disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GodOverMoney

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: THe computer is perfect, looks like new and performs like new. I only wish I had noticed that it does not have a touch screen,
customer_reviews.author: candelier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Condition
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many used computers for general lab use and this was probably the cleanest and best maintained of the lot.
customer_reviews.author: Just Plain Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great system/price for general home computing.
customer_reviews.text: Great system/price for general home computing. Everything worked right out of the box. Looks and runs like new. Easily loaded my Office applications.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about a refurbished unit, but was pleasantly surprised. Outside of a few minor cosmetic scratches, the computer looks and operates perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Dell Latitude laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice computer, but it DID NOT have a WLAN card in it, so it was NOT wireless. I took one out of an old laptop and it is now. Not what I wanted to do on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: OpenMinded

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, hit or miss product...
customer_reviews.text: The laptops are priced right and I bought two. One came as expected, the other was not clean and even a slower model. Not happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: Savoon

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a field tech, W7 installed perfect and the unit is more than enough with the i5
customer_reviews.author: Attn4d

customer_reviews.title: A $2000 computer for $200
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great. It performs with my engineering software that is very taxing.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Dell
customer_reviews.text: Windows was not loaded and the machine smelt like cigarette smoke. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Re

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality refurbished Laptop
customer_reviews.text: The laptop I bought was a refurbished one, when I received it I didn't have time to check and inspect as I was travelling abroad for 6 months. but later I found out that the hinges were very loose and the laptop would wobble and the battery went bad within 2 months of usage. basically I have realized that never buy refurbished Items unless you are very sure about the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Kumar Nanam

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 1/2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Pc only lasted 3 1/2 months and now it’s dead... contacted company for a return and without any feedback they denied my return because it was past the “3 month” warranty period!!! Terrible!! They don’t stand behind their products
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Savage

customer_reviews.title: OS installed properly.  Battery does not hold.  The supplier does not respond to any queries.
customer_reviews.text: All came and working properly. OS installed properly. No dents. While currently i did not use a lot, so far all three units that i bought seem to behave the way it is intended. The one issue is - one of the units battery is not working. i did not notice it the first day. While the unit works normal with power, I am giving three starts just for this reason. Reduced the star to one - supplier is not even responding for the defective battery. Probably deal with Amazon directly
customer_reviews.author: A very discriminating user

customer_reviews.title: Excellent packaging to prevent any damage during shipment
customer_reviews.text: Very timely delivery. Excellent packaging to prevent any damage during shipment. Excellent product. Met expectations as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Louis M.

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 invalid license
customer_reviews.text: I have always like the Dell refurbs so I ordered this one for my mom. when I got it the Windows 10 license key is not valid. This is going to make me mad if I bought this when it said that windows 10 is included and I have to buy a product key!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: got here fast and runs like a champ
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. got here fast and runs like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stys

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 and they are great
customer_reviews.text: Great and powerful laptops, at an even greater price. Very happy with them. Although refurbished, you can barely tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tjoe

customer_reviews.title: Solid laptop, value for dollar.
customer_reviews.text: This Dell laptop is just wonderful! It has speed and power and a non glare screen. The people at tekrefurbs did a fantastic job at restoring it! It works perfectly so far and I really love it! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Yogadiva

customer_reviews.title: Only if you get lucky
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time I had to return item because battery lasted 10 minutes fully charged
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio olivares

customer_reviews.title: I love this little laptop - does everything I want for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this little laptop - does everything I want for trolling the internet and I use it to edit / store / archive /and transfer to external drive for photos
customer_reviews.author: QUBED 69

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: A very solid product. It was very easy to set up and import my old files. I don't use my laptops too often so I was looking for something simple and reliable and this will do the trick. I only gave four out of five because there have been a couple hiccups in my first week which have required me to force it to shut off and a restart. Also, there is no camera but there is a back lit keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: Wish there are more stars to give.. Product runs good 100%. Getting the same service as a $3k laptop.. No bottleneck performance.. Fast n scalable..
customer_reviews.author: Layo

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: No power cord. Will update when I can turn it on
customer_reviews.author: annette yount

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain, But Slow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop recently and for the price it is a good bargain. The battery lasts about 2 hours or so, which is OK since I have it plugged in at home most of the time. My issue however is with the speed. The computer takes a very long time to boot up and open programs. Even loading a webpage takes quite a long time (I have a work laptop, which has no issues with speed on the net, so it is not my connection). I feel like the RAM needs to be upgraded for the computer to function at a normal speed.
customer_reviews.author: Yaseen Nasser

customer_reviews.title: Charger Stopped Supplying Power To PC.
customer_reviews.text: Charger stopped supplying power to the pc after 32 days of esy use( 1-3) hours a day. Cheap chinies junk charger.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Storm

customer_reviews.title: Was very disappointed. Package it up and still it back
customer_reviews.text: When I receive the computer and got it set up I tried to run a program and got a reading that there was a issue with Hard Drive. Tried one more time and got the same noticed. Was very disappointed. Package it up and still it back. You would think that it would of been tested before go on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hahnlen

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for two weeks now and so far it functions as good as new
customer_reviews.text: The computer came very clean, with only minor scratches from its previous owner that wouldn't have come out with any amount of cleaning. I've had it for two weeks now and so far it functions as good as new. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product not like discrived
customer_reviews.text: I would like to put a serious complaint, since the product is used, with scratches and the truth is a total disappointment, I could not be well with my wife, for which I demand that I get the money back and warn other users to be careful when they buy to this seller who fell into the trap, I am annoyed which I demand an answer.
customer_reviews.author: cotrols

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, laptop, price.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and as advertised. Fantastic service and laptop.
customer_reviews.author: yourmouthistalking

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Had to return two times First one package was best up computer busted second one did not boot up third one has a bunch of of glitches but working
customer_reviews.author: John Ramo

customer_reviews.title: Let's see if they make it right for me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet. I got it, had it for about 2 weeks with very minimal use and it has a black screen.... sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Will die on you.
customer_reviews.text: Received and out of the box, battery was dead. Amazon sent a new battery. It worked for a while but this morning, it is completely dead. Don't buy this. You will thank me.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: minor hiccup
customer_reviews.text: I got this computer for my daughter to do homework on and play Minecraft. It worked fine for a bit, quit working, we contacted the seller, they called to have me try a few things, determined it was the charger cord, and they're sending a new one within 2 days, so we're happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that no power adapter came with unit.
customer_reviews.text: Actually have not been able to use laptop as it came with no power adapter and the battery is dead.
customer_reviews.author: R. David Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for a great price. For the money I put down it works astoundingly well! I use it daily for my business and performs well
customer_reviews.author: David Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Solid computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: The computer is in really good shape and runs perfectly for being refurbished. This may be my fault for not thoroughly checking, but the only reason I'm giving four stars is because this particular version is without a built in webcam. This item was shipped very fast and everything was as promised!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Plug in needed even on full battery
customer_reviews.text: Is it normal that on a full battery I still need to plug it in in order for the device to turn on? Otherwise it's ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time purchasing a Dell Laptop
customer_reviews.text: It was a good buy. Came in handy for my job working from home.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette R. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for. Internet access, music, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tota

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is fast and we've found no dysfunctions. It's not my first rodeo with regard to laptops and the Windows 10 Pro is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work came with corrupted copy of Windows preloaded so I never made it past the start up screen, it was a hassle to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D.

customer_reviews.title: Not Refurbished as Described
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt, computer's speaker is faulty, with static and exceptionally low volume for a laptop. In addition, the Seller did not include an Invoice or any information whatsoever in the package, making it impossible to contact the Seller or parties responsible for refurbishing the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: LPL

customer_reviews.title: All is now good in laptop world
customer_reviews.text: No instructions came with the laptop detailing how to activate. Clicked on change product key and scratched off the decal covering the product key tag on the bottom of the unit and entered. All is now good in laptop world.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Brockmyer

product_meta.title: Dell Latitude E6430 14in Notebook PC - Intel Core i5-3320 2.6GHz 8GB 320gb SATA Windows 10 Professional (Renewed)
product_meta.description:
Offering just the right balance between performance and mobility, the business-rugged Dell Latitude E6430 is ideal for office-to-home professionals who are producing on the go.

Specifications: 
Processor: Intel Core I5 3320M, up to 3.3GHz
Graphics: Intel HD Integrated 
Memory: 8GB DDR3 
Hard Drive: 320GB SSD 

Operating System: 
Windows 10 Home 64 Bit – Multi-language supports English/Spanish/French

Ports: 
Network connector (RJ-45), USB 2.0 (2) - 1 USB/eSATA combo; USB 3.0 (2), Stereo headphone/Microphone combo jack, Memory card reader, 54mm ExpressCard, Docking connector, VGA, HDMI 

Warranty 
1 full year Parts and Labor Warranty

Included in the box 
Computer; Power Cord; Warranty Instruction.
feature_bullets: Dell Latitude E6430 14" Notebook PC Computer Intel Core i5-3320 Windows 10 Pro
